description:
### Note: This Refinitiv Workspace application is owned and copyright by Refinitive. This chocolatey packages is only created and published here to easily deploy Refinitiv Workspace Application for Windows Workstations.

## Refinitiv Workspace a.k.a (Refinitiv Eikon Messenger)

Refinitiv Workspace is the financial analysis desktop and mobile solution, for access to leading data and content, Reuters news, markets and liquidity pools.
summary: Refinitiv Workspace is the financial analysis desktop and mobile solution, for access to leading data and content, Reuters news, markets and liquidity pools.
author: Refinitive
